title: Xerath ???
body: Hello,I recently obtained the BattleCast Xerath skin.Now I already knew about the champion because I played against one and now that I got the skin I was pretty happy so I was gonna buy the champ but,there was no buy button just "???".I wanna know how to get this champion please help me.

replies.body:
Be sure you're trying to buy Xerath from the store and not your Summoner Profile. Sometimes if you try buying a champ from your profile, it causes weird stuff like this to happen.

Hope that helps!
Oh ok thank you very much
